metadata.description: Sam Kieth's special brand of comic book art has influenced the industry from Sandman to MTV's Liquid Television. Zero Girl is the story of Amy Smootster, a 15-year-old high school student whose feelings of alienation and loneliness occasionally manifest in the form of odd abilities. She deals as best she can with the help of her high school guidance counselor Tim, whom she is secretly in love with.
metadata.name: Zero Girl
